Section.name: About BESTIU
Section.description:
Bharatiya Engineering Science and Technology Innovation University (BESTIU) is situated in Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh and was established in 2019. It offers UG & PG courses like B.Tech, MBA, B.Sc, BA, B.Sc {Hons.}, BBA, BBA + MBA, B.Des, M.Sc, M.A, M.Tech, Ph.D, M.Phil, Executive, Diploma, and Certification. The admission to these courses is based on BEE (BESTIU Entrance Exam). The application mode is both online and offline.
Different kinds of courses are taught in BESTIU. Some of these are discussed below:
